units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S5U01 — Adaptations for survival
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y5 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Chemical Sciences, so this Y5 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: IT Support Specialist
careers.whyThis: IT Support Specialist uses the Physical Sciences you’ve already been learning. To move towards IT Support Specialist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. IT Support Specialist is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see IT Support Specialist now and understand what to work towards.
